section.title: Rule flows
section.para: Rule flows: Rule flows allow you to visually describe the steps taken - so not all rules are evaluated at once, but there is a flow of logic. Rule flows are not covered in this chapter on the Guvnor, but you can use the IDE to graphically draw ruleflows, and upload the .rfm file to the Guvnor.
Similar to spreadsheets, you upload/download ruleflow files (the eclipse IDE has a graphical editor for them). The details of Rule Flows are not discussed here.
